Description:
BEAUTIFUL HOME, PRIME LOCATION
Situated within walking distance to all of Drysdale’s shops, cafes and local amenities is this delightful property set on approx 224m2 featuring 3 generous bedrooms with WWC and Master bedroom with ensuite and WIR. The functional modern kitchen features a gas cooktop and dishwasher and there is a large central bathroom. This is a beautiful modern home that will appeal to those looking to downsize in comfort without compromising on style, or the first home buyer looking for a low maintenance home. Set on its own title with no Body Corporate, opportunities like this do not present often. Don't miss out!
Insights: 24 Elgin Street, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 22 other 3 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
ENJOY THE PRIVACY, SERENITY AND SPACE
Situated in one of the most sought after locations in Drysdale this beautifully presented family home is set upon approx. 1139m2 of land and featuring a generous layout. This property is the ultimate choice for those looking to store caravans, boats, trailers, and more. Ideal for a young family or owner occupier. This incredible home boasts 3-4 bedrooms, 2 living areas that are well lit by natural light (all windows are lightly tinted), 2 bathrooms and 2 toilets. Already boasting ample off-street parking, a double carport, plus a double garage located towards the rear of the property, which includes a work shop, toilet, and a log heater. Attached to the garage is another room which could be used as a teenagers retreat, a guest room, or a work studio. The possibilities that this property offers are endless.
The elements are in place for easy family living, with the well loved home creating a welcoming ambiance. At the front of the house is the Master Bedroom which features walk in robe, en-suite and a study. The front lounge is full of glass and light, and flows through to the kitchen/dining zone. The kitchen boasts an island bench, 2 Pak cupboards, Maytag dishwasher, 600mm Kleenmaid gas cooktop and wall oven. Towards the rear of the house are an additional 2 bedrooms with built-in robes, main bathroom, laundry with storage and separate toilet. Braemar ducted heating (which is zoned) and a split system air conditioner complete the layout.
The wonderfully spacious north facing backyard is home to lovely gardens, undercover alfresco area, 2 water tanks to service the garden, a charming cubby house and an array of fruit trees, including apricot, ballerina apple, triple grafted apple, plum and lemon trees.
There is something to delight everyone. The nearby Drysdale Shopping Centre inspires people to venture outdoors, with public transport, kindergartens, Primary and Secondary Schools, world class wineries and the area's many renowned golf courses within close proximity. A convenient lifestyle is part of the package.
This outstanding home is well worth your personal inspection. You will need to act swiftly to snap up this unique opportunity!
Insights: 37 De Burgh Road, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 35 other 4 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
PRIME INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY
This superbly positioned unit in the heart of Drysdale has a long term tenancy and a secure lease in place until July 2020, leased at $12,480 p.a.
It has been well maintained by the tenants for many years and features 2 bedrooms, a central bathroom, functional kitchen overlooking the rear northeast facing courtyard and a secure lock up garage.
Its close proximity to Drysdale’s local shopping hub, cafes, walking tracks and amenities is ideal and has an orientation on the block that enjoys privacy. If you're looking for a low maintenance, secure investment opportunity, this is it!

Description:
DRYSDALE VILLA , THE VILLAGE , PARKLANDS & ALL AMENITIES ON YOUR DOORSTEP
Top spot with the best of both worlds overlooking the garden and adjacent to parklands , while still being in the centre of the town area. Light filled open plan lounge and kitchen space , two bedrooms both with BIR'S, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Features include new carpets and flooring, central heating, split system, fans , pantry and more. Easy to care for garden, undercover outdoor area and single garage. This freestanding villa is the perfect place to call home, so private and quiet. Call me now for an inspection, will not disappoint.

Description:
'Murradoc Park'
Prestigious Bellarine Peninsula
World Class Panoramic Views
Melbourne City Skyline, Mornington Peninsula, Port Phillip Bay & Heads to Ocean
"Value for money, there is no finer lifestyle rural investment property available in Australia today"
• 60 Acres (24.28 Ha) of prime undulating productive country,divided into seven paddocks with electric fencing, shelter plantations.
• Quality solid brick homestead, 3 bedrooms, study with all amenities, indoor and outdoor entertaining areas, conservatory. Set in magnificent park land setting with automatic watering system.
• Garaging, shedding & cattle yards
• Securely watered by 3 dams & rainwater storage
Murradoc Park' situated high on Mount Bellarine in the blue ribbon heart of the prestigious Bellarine Peninsula in a tightly held and capital appreciating region, ideal cattle (carrying 25 cows and calves) , horses, sheep, viticulture. 3 minutes Drysdale/St. Leonards, 5 minutes Portarlington (Ferry Service) , 15 minutes Queenscliff (Ferry Service), 20 minutes Geelong, 35 minutes Avalon Airport, 70 minutes Melbourne CBD & International Airport.
Inspection: Strictly by appointment with agent

Description:
Executive Style Living!
Conveniently positioned right in the heart of Drysdale's premiere Central Walk Estate is this fine executive residence. Grand proportions, towering nine foot ceilings and fixtures of the highest calibre create an exceptional buying prospect.
• An attractive streetscape and wonderful green leafy vistas provide a truly tranquil setting for this contemporary built home
• A classic open plan design provides a wonderful light and bright experience; clever use of windows further enhances an abundance of natural light
• The hub of this fine residence is a beautifully appointed kitchen; an eye catching waterfall edge island bench is complemented by dual stone benchtops, 900ml gas cooktop, feature pendant lighting, custom cabinetry, a stylish mirrored splashback is sure to turn heads and an enviable butler's pantry.
• An expansive dining/living area is room enough for the entire family; a trio of glass stacker doors provide a seamless connection to a fully equipped and tiled alfresco zone.
• A theatre room provides a 2nd independent living zone and further endorses this properties user friendly nature.
• Grand luxury is an apt description of the master suite; unrivalled size and scale is complemented by sophisticated styling. Glass sliding doors create a lovely connection to the alfresco area and provide filtered natural light. A stylish ensuite is complete with porcelain tiles, oversized luxury shower and custom cabinetry. A generous walk-in robe ensures excellent storage solutions.
• Two additional bedrooms are a generous size, they are cleverly positioned to create a 'guest wing' and are serviced by a full family bathroom.
• An oversized double remote controlled garage (6.8m x 6m approx.) creates scope for great storage and/or work shop.
• An exceptional land holding of 536m2
• All the modern comforts and further features to be discovered on inspection.
• Central Walk has quickly established itself as Drysdale's exclusive estate. Beautiful wetlands, open tree lined streets and homes stamped with quality as far as the eye can see. This property looks a wonderful home for today and savvy investment for the future.
Insights: 20 Platinum Avenue, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 22 other 3 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
Location, Large & Lovable
If you have been waiting for the property that ticks all the boxes, wait no more.
This centrally located property is just the thing you have been looking for.
Located just minutes’ walk to Drysdale shopping and café precinct, it is a rare find to have such a large parcel of land so close.
Consisting of 4 bedrooms plus study, and separate detached unit at the rear, this property abounds with terrific features, with open plan, separate retreat area for that private chill time, full ensuite and separate bathroom, all adds up to comfort plus living, the kitchen is fully renovated with dishwasher and large enough to please any gourmet guru.
The features don’t stop there, with the comfort of a wood fire heater and evaporative cooling, bedrooms are spacious and all have built in robes and main bedroom with the full ensuite and walk in robe.
Moving to the outside it consists of SPACE -SPACE-SPACE.
Side access for the van, boat, tradie truck or whatever other kit you bring, you can back it right up to the large shed, knowing it will be safe and sound behind the high lockable gates.
With north facing court yard and alfresco you will have plenty of room for entertaining, the kids can run free over the spacious grassy area where there is an abundance of garden areas and plenty of shade from the many fruit trees. To the rear of the property there is a fantastic two-bedroom unit separate from the main residence with kitchenette and bathroom facilities, for the extended family, teenage kids or rent it out for that extra income. This property sits on a land size of 1,036m² ample space for the developer looking for a project near to Drysdale's central shopping area (STCA).
All this sits just across the road from the Drysdale recreational reserve, sporting facilities and much much more.
Inspection is essential if you are looking at being in one of the best spots money can buy in Drysdale.
Insights: 86 Wyndham Street, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
Renovate, relocate or develop
From the bullnose verandah to the rough sawn weatherboards this very large family home has a rustic yester-year appeal just waiting to be rejuvenated. Exceptional opportunity to acquire a large parcel of land in central Drysdale overlooking the Drysdale Recreation Reserve.
A massive family room with open fire place greets you upon entry.
All rooms have sliding door access to the verandah.
The kitchen overlooks the very large formal dining room.
All bedrooms are located to the rear of the house with built in robes.
Master bedroom with a walk in robe & ensuite.
There is still plenty of backyard & wide side access to the stand alone garage.
The possibilities are endless; from a full renovation to relocation & subdivision (S.T.C.A).

Description:
Horses For Courses
This 18 acre horse property is a unique opportunity for those looking to establish or continue a love of horses. Divided into 19 paddocks with a central laneway and 1000 metre sand track. Numerous Shelters, wash bay, and day yards. Perimeter shelter belts. Town water by private line plus 60000 litre tanks. Sandy loam soil. Agistment potential. Older style 4 bedroom brick home. Ideally located close to the Drysdale township

Description:
STONES THROW TO THE SHOPS
It doesn’t get any closer, only 100 metres and you’re there, whether it be the coffee, the supermarket the doctors, the bowls or the bus, it’s all walking distance wherever you want to go.
This immaculate two bedroom unit is special, fully repainted, and new carpets throughout.
Bedrooms are a great size, both with built in robes. The fully renovated and tastefully styled bathroom is nothing short of resort style and caters for all your needs and equipped with under floor heating for those chilly mornings.
The open plan lounge and kitchen area opens out to a spacious north facing rear courtyard, perfect for when you just want to sit in the sun and have a read, or just potter in the garden area.
The single garage rear roller door opens out to the rear garden, giving you even more space if you need to entertain.
This unit is a must see if your looking to downsize and want to be near to all Drysdale has to offer.

Description:
Impressive entertaining family haven.
A grand living home combined with class and elegance that is quietly nestled away in a well desired pocket of Drysdale. This soundly built Porter Davis home sits on a generous 648m2 block (approx.). providing the perfect balance of entertaining and family living by the coast.
The spacious residence features five expansive bedrooms all with built in robes, three living areas, study, three bathrooms plus downstairs powder room. Cleverly designed light filled open plan features a central kitchen fitted with quality appliances and stone bench tops that extends cleverly out to the undercover timber deck ideal for entertaining all year round. Additional features include central gas heating, evaporative cooling & double glazed windows. To conclude, the secure lock up double car garage provides internal access straight into your home.
Prominent Bayvista Parade is occupied by quality homes and family friendly neighbours. Located within just a km distance to local facilities such as supermarkets, medical clinics, post office and parklands. Ideally surrounded by schools including Drysdale Primary, St. Ignatius College and St. Thomas Catholic just to name a few.
Hurry in. Ready for your family to move in and not do a thing
Insights: 13 Bayvista Parade, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 2 other 5 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
SET IN THE GREEN BELT, 2 ACRES OF BLISS ! MINUTES TO THE JETTY!
Behind the fence a much loved lifestyle property with northern orientation overlooking private gardens. Spacious loungeroom, adjacent dining and large kitchen, another sitting room (library or TV) as well as study or fifth bedroom. Four bedrooms, master with ensuite, three with BIR'S, central bathroom and laundry. A big rumpus room at the other end of the home , a flexible space for the third living space. Features include floor heating, airconditioner, dishwasher , pantry, loads of storage and more. Extra large triple carport, workshop, storage bay, chook yards, 7 fruit trees and big inground swimming pool ( not used for 6 years) . This magic property is walking distance to the Drysdale Village passing McClouds Waterhole, recreational reserve and Lorne Lake. the Rail Trail takes you all the way to Queenscliff. Schools ( Bellarine High, St. Ignatius, Christian College and more) parklands, all amenities and shops closeby. Feel like you are at home immediately....I did.
Insights: 9 Cowies Road, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 2 other 5 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
Serene Estate
A lifestyle opportunity enabling you to thrive and prosper in an intimate residential estate. Residing in this enviable location offers a lifestyle of coastal living, the convenience of a large regional centre within a 20 minute drive and designed around a semi rural, close knit community with every convenience at your doorstep.
The peninsula location is renowned for the idyllic, outdoor lifestyle. Spend a day at the beach, go fishing or enjoy a glass of your favourite wine at one of our many local wineries. The Port Phillip Ferry sails twice daily from Portarlington to South Bank if you fancy a day trip to the city. You will ask yourself why you didn't make the move sooner.
Ground works to commence late 2018.
Selling fast, contact Rhonda Humpage 0457 313609

Description:
Easy-Care Living Close To Town
Neat and tidy, this move-in ready three-bedroom unit is a casual 400m stroll from central Drysdale making it a must-see for first home owners, downsizers and investors. There's no need to compromise on space when it comes to this charming residence. A large open-plan living and dining room offers ample space for everyone and leads through to a great kitchen boasting plenty of storage and a breakfast bar. The three bedrooms, two with built-in robes are serviced by the central bathroom with shower, bath and separate toilet. Outside, a covered pergola is the best place to start the day with a cuppa in hand while you take in views over the generous garden. Set on 431sqm of land, additional benefits include a single lock-up garage, gas heating and air-conditioning. The convenience of central Drysdale being just around the corner with everything you need including shops, transport and schools are all on offer.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 2/26 Carolanne Drive, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 2 other 3 bedroom unit in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Favourite in Popular Location
Located in an enviable position between central Drysdale and Clifton’s Springs waterfront, this comfortable family home boasts an open plan living and dining room with a gloriously sunny northerly aspect with a superb galley style kitchen, great for entertaining! This spacious home features Master with ensuite & large WIR plus 3 further bedrooms with the well proportioned fourth bedroom having the option of being used as a study or kids activity room. The home features brand new WWC and ducted heating throughout for warmth as well as split system cooling for the warmer months. The double sized garage has drive through access to the rear and outside enjoys a good sized low maintenance back yard giving the kids lots of room to play. Set on approx. 648m2 of land with schools, parklands, pony club and shops all in close proximity making this the ideal family choice for space and location!
Insights: 69 Barrands Lane, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 35 other 4 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
Low Maintenance Lifestyle
This brick veneer townhouse is in fantastic condition and is ideal for anyone looking to downsize or after a sound investment. Enjoy the wonderful lifestyle of the Bellarine Peninsula, conveniently located only a short stroll to the heart of the Drysdale township, parks and schools. Featuring two good size bedrooms, the main includes a walk-in robe and access to a two-way bathroom with shower and separate bath, a spacious open plan living area including a functional kitchen with gas cooking, lounge with split-system A/C and tiled meals area. Outside features a covered pergola area, a private and tidy courtyard plus a double garage with internal access. Make sure you inspect this beautifully maintained, low maintenance home. It's sure to impress!

Description:
2.3 Acres (approx.) with Amazing Water Views
Surrounded by mature trees on the corner of Andersons Road, this elevated block has a northwesterly aspect that captures views of Corio Bay, the You Yangs and Lake Lorne. Zoned Rural/Living, this acreage offers plenty of options to enjoy a semi rural lifestyle close to Drysdale. Schools, including St Ignatius College and Bellarine Secondary are just minutes walk away as is the Bellarine Rail Trail and the Drysdale Pony Club. Utilise the block and create a dream coastal home in this quiet locale. Options for using the land are varied; establish a large garden, plant some vines or simply enjoy the views.
A tranquil haven for commuters, Geelong is close by (approx 30 mins drive) and daily travel to Melbourne is convenient via the new Portarlington - Melbourne ferry located 10 mins away. Located in the semi rural zone around Drysdale , a new home on this property will be peaceful and quiet, yet close to shops, cafes, local wineries and markets and the regions best beaches.
- Elevated block with North Westerly aspect, captures water views.
- Minutes walk to St Ignatius and Bellarine Secondary College
- Amenities of Drysdale a short drive away
- Enjoy the Bellarine Rail Trail and Drysdale Pony Club a short walk away
- Neatly situated for commuting to Geelong or Melbourne via ferry.
- Zoned Rural/Living offering a semi rural lifestyle opportunity
Insights: 57-63 Gillies Road, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
A CUT ABOVE!
This absolutely immaculate property is in as new condition and really is a cut above the rest. Situated in a most convenient location just a few minutes walk to central Drysdale shopping with public transport past the front door. Offering buyers generous open plan living with well equipped kitchen plus a meals area that leads out to an under cover outdoor living zone. All 3 bedrooms are of good dimensions and have robes. The master comes with a full ensuite. All fittings and fixtures throughout the property are of a high standard and tasteful. Higher ceilings create an added feeling of spaciousness. Central gas heating plus split system cooling will keep you comfortable all year round. The double garage with remote panel lift door has access into the home. All and all this is a property you really must inspect if you are contemplating a smaller block but not wanting to downsize or compromise quality of the home.
